abstract: The Walt Disney Company, Hearst and General Electric’s NBC Universal are in talks to create a new corporate entity comprising the 10 cable channels the three companies own jointly, including A&E, Lifetime and History.
snippet: The Walt Disney Company, Hearst and General Electric’s NBC Universal are in talks to create a new corporate entity comprising the 10 cable channels the three companies own jointly, including A&E, Lifetime and History.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company, Hearst and General Electric‘s NBC Universal are in talks to create a corporate entity comprising the 10 cable channels the three companies own jointly, including A&E, Lifetime and History, Reuters said.

headline.main: Disney, Hearst and NBC in Cable Talks
